body.p: The entity shall account for share‑based payment transactions in which it receives services as consideration for its own equity instruments as equity‑settled. This applies regardless of whether the entity chooses or is required to buy those equity instruments from another party to satisfy its obligations to its employees under the share‑based payment arrangement. It also applies regardless of whether:

li.p: the employee’s rights to the entity’s equity instruments were granted by the entity itself or by its shareholder(s); or
the share‑based payment arrangement was settled by the entity itself or by its shareholder(s).
